column4: When i try to play WMV or MOV files in firefox, it shows a black screen and says "no video"
i did that, now it segfaults
yuck. okay, sudo apt-get remove vlc-plugin-esd && sudo apt-get install mozilla-mplayer
if that doesn't work, remove it and try totem-gstreamer-firefox-plugin
there's a whole bunch of media player plugins for firefox. one of them is bound to work :)
hmm. that's very strange. hold on
have you installed codecs for wmv and mov?
mplayer can't play .wmv by default. you need w32codecs.
mplayer can play both wmv and mov, i have codec's for them and they both work
ah. that's very strange. sorry, i don't know what's wrong :(
